Strings.String: Administrator permissions are required to install Microsoft Visual Studio 2010 Report Viewer. Contact your administrator.
Installation of Microsoft Visual Studio 2010 Report Viewer requires Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5. Contact your application vendor.
Due to an error with Windows Installer, the installation of Microsoft Visual Studio 2010 Report Viewer cannot proceed.
Another instance of setup is already running. The running instance must complete before this setup can proceed.
A beta version of Microsoft Visual Studio 2010 Report Viewer was detected on the computer. Uninstall any previous beta versions of Microsoft Visual Studio 2010 Report Viewer before continuing.
A failure occurred attempting to install Microsoft Visual Studio 2010 Report Viewer.
